# StartOfScan.SuccessiveApproximationBitPositionHigh property

Specifies the point at which successive approximation begins, indicating the bit position for the first scan of a particular set of coefficients. Used in progressive JPEGs and is set to `0` in baseline JPEGs.

```csharp
public byte SuccessiveApproximationBitPositionHigh { get; set; }
```
